name: Doctors Without Borders
bio: Doctors Without Borders provides medical care to those in need, regardless of where they are or the challenges they face. Our teams work in conflict zones, natural disasters, and provide essential healthcare to communities worldwide.

name: Save the Children
bio: Save the Children works to ensure that every child has the opportunity to learn, grow, and thrive. We provide education, health, and safety programs to children in need around the world.

name: Greenpeace
bio: Greenpeace is dedicated to protecting the planet and promoting peace. We tackle environmental issues such as climate change, deforestation, and pollution through advocacy, direct action, and peaceful protests.

name: Amnesty International
bio: Amnesty International is a global movement that fights injustice and promotes human rights for all. We campaign against abuses such as discrimination, torture, and censorship.

name: Oxfam
bio: Oxfam works to end poverty and injustice by addressing the root causes of inequality. We provide support in emergencies, advocate for fair policies, and empower communities to build a better future.

name: World Wildlife Fund
bio: World Wildlife Fund is committed to preserving the world's most vulnerable species and ecosystems. We work to address threats to biodiversity and promote sustainable practices for a thriving planet.
